casebody.data:
Zelda B. Wolfe, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Chicago Transit Authority, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 54660;First District —June 14, 1971.George J. Schaller, O. R. Hamlink, Jerome F. Dixon, and Edmund J. Burke, all of Chicago, for appellant.Barry Goodman, of Chicago, for appellee.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE LYONS.
